title: How to Draw a Hotdog

steps.headline: Create the bun.
steps.description: Start off your drawing with the signature hotdog bun. Create the bun by replicating the shape of a large bean.

steps.headline: Draw the hot dog ends.
steps.description: Add the end pieces of the hotdog by creating a C like shape and attaching it on both ends of the bun.

steps.headline: Add toppings.
steps.description: No hotdog is complete without toppings of course. On top of the hotdog draw a squiggly line to make the ketchup or mustard. Feel free to add other toppings such as relish it's your drawing after all.

steps.headline: Erase any mistakes.
steps.description: Notice any smudge marks or errors then remove the errors with a good quality eraser.

steps.headline: Colour in the drawing.
steps.description: Add some colour to your freshly drawn image. Use tan for the bun, brown for the sausage, and yellow or red for the mustard or ketchup.

steps.headline: Add shading to the drawing.
steps.description: Shading the drawing is optional however, it will make the drawing end up looking better.

steps.headline: Outline the drawing.
steps.description: Use a dark colour to outline the drawing to really make it pop.
